item.title: Wordpress 3.1 Post Formats In Standard Theme 2.6
item.description: I learned a little something this weekend about a new feature that Wordpress developed to help bloggers accomplish more in the limited time that we have. It's called 'Post Formats' and it is a really interesting approach to content development. The Wordpress codex (information hub for Wordpress.org) says there are several options to choose from now for styling your blog posts. For instance, sometimes you need to simply show an interesting quote.
